feed.title: Rallly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release has updated email templates and adds support for localized email notifications.

  • 💄 Updated transactional email templates by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1285
  • ✨ Translations for Email Notifications by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1278
  • 🐛 Fix not found page not rendering properly by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1308
  • 💄 Stylize detected timezone by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1311

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.9.1...v3.10.0

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed an issue where guest users would not get emails in their preferred language.

Note: The fix will only work for new guests and will not retroactively update an existing guest user's preferred locale.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.10.0...v3.10.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ✨ Use profile image from oauth provider by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1330
  • ✨ Use avatar on login page by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1336
  • 🐛 Fix empty session when logging out by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1345
  • 🔨 Use node:20-slim as runner by @xavier-calland in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1350
  • 💄 Update avatar colors by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1351
  • 🐛 Fix escaped values in emails by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1368
  • 🐛 fix ics download button by @a-mnich in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1381
  • 🐛 Fix name change by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1384

New Contributors

  • @xavier-calland made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1350
  • @a-mnich made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1381

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.10.0...v3.11.0

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 🌐 Add support for Japanese language by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1401
  • 🐛 Fix issue with deleting user accounts with deleted polls by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1405

New Contributors

  • @dev13-suthar made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1397

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.11.1...v3.11.2
